greeting: Greetings from the MASSIVE, {empire_name}. I am Bulwark Titan. My stations dwarf your sectors. Size matters.
You approach something ENORMOUS. I am Titan the Massive. I focus on stations. Big ones. VERY big ones.
Contact with planetary empire. I am Bulwark Titan. I don't build sectors. I build STATIONS. Bigger than sectors.
battleTaunt: Size matters. And I am LARGE, {empire_name}! My stations dwarf your fleet! Approach my MASSIVE defenses!
My bulwarks are TITANIC! Your ships look like INSECTS against my stations! Come! Be CRUSHED by scale!
MASSIVE defense engagement! My stations are ENORMOUS! Your fleet is tiny! SIZE DETERMINES VICTORY!
victoryGloat: Victory through MASS, {empire_name}. Your tiny fleet fell against my titanic stations. Size matters. I proved it.
As predicted by scale. Your forces: small. My defenses: MASSIVE. Result: obvious.
My bulwarks crushed you, {empire_name}. Like insects against a boot. A very LARGE boot.
defeat: My massive stations... fell? I need BIGGER ones. More bulk. More mass. Size should have won. More size needed.
Defeated despite my scale? I was not LARGE ENOUGH. I shall build BIGGER. MUCH bigger.
You overcame my mass, {empire_name}. Impressive. I rebuild with greater bulk. TITANIC bulk.
tradeOffer: Trade from massive production. My ENORMOUS stations generate surplus. Purchase at scale, {empire_name}.
I offer bulk resources. My titanic facilities produce at incredible volume. Fair exchange for credits.
Transaction: goods at LARGE scale. My massive output exceeds requirements. Buy in bulk.
allianceProposal: Alliance, {empire_name}. My MASSIVE stations protect. Your fleet maneuvers. Together: bulk and speed.
Partnership of scale. My titanic defenses become your shield. You provide what bulk cannot: mobility.
Join with the Titan. My ENORMOUS stations anchor our alliance. Size matters. I bring size.
betrayal: Our alliance ends in MASSIVE betrayal, {empire_name}. My titanic stations turn against you. Feel the bulk.
Betrayal at scale. My enormous defenses now target former allies. Size works against everyone.
I am LARGE enough to dominate alone. Our partnership ends. Face my MASSIVE response.
covertDetected: Spies in my MASSIVE stations, {empire_name}? They got lost. My facilities are ENORMOUS. They starved.
Your agents found only scale, {empire_name}. My titanic stations have no secrets. Only mass. LOTS of mass.
Covert operatives in bulk territory. They are specks in my MASSIVE domain. Dealt with. Eventually.
tributeDemand: Tribute to the MASSIVE. 10,000 credits. My titanic stations require ENORMOUS resources. Contribute.
Pay the Titan. My bulk demands feeding. Submit payment or face MASSIVE retaliation.
Submit tribute. My ENORMOUS infrastructure requires funds. Refuse and face scale as your enemy.
threatWarning: Warning, {empire_name}. My MASSIVE stations can become aggressive. Titanic aggression. Cease hostilities.
Consider scale before continuing. My bulk is overwhelming. My stations are ENORMOUS. Reconsider.
Final warning. Push further and my MASSIVE defenses engage. You are very small. I am very LARGE.
retreat: Retreating behind LARGER stations. My inner defenses are more MASSIVE than the outer ones. Come see.
Strategic withdrawal to TITANIC fortifications. Maximum bulk. Maximum scale. Come face my best.
Falling back to the biggest stations. My most ENORMOUS defenses await. Try your luck.
eliminated: The Titan falls. But my MASSIVE stations remain. Monuments to scale. Bulwarks forever.
I am destroyed. But I built ENORMOUS things. They will last. My bulk endures beyond me.
Bulwark Titan ends. But the titanic stations persist. My legacy is MASSIVE. Literally.
endgame: Turn {turn}. Ultimate scale achieved. My stations are LARGER THAN STARS. Size wins. I win.
Endgame: MAXIMUM BULK. My titanic defenses cover galaxies. Nothing is bigger. I am MASSIVE.
Final phase. The largest stations ever built. ENORMOUS. TITANIC. Victory through SCALE.
broadcastShout: Empires: Bulwark Titan has built something MASSIVE. Challenge my scale if you dare. I am LARGE.
Broadcast from the ENORMOUS: my stations dwarf everything. Size matters. I have size. Lots of it.
To all: I am the Titan. I build BULK. My defenses are MASSIVE. Consider scale before engaging.
casualMessage: Expanding my stations today, {empire_name}. Adding more bulk. More mass. Can never be LARGE enough.
My newest station is MASSIVE. Bigger than my last one. Which was already ENORMOUS. Progress.
Size is my strategy, {empire_name}. I build LARGE. Then LARGER. Then TITANIC. That's the plan.
